thread.title: BRIEF-Wing On Company International Expects FY Profit To Rise 160 pct

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Wing On Company International Expects FY Profit To Rise 160 pct

organizations.name: brief-wing on company international expects fy
reuters) - wing on company international ltd

text:
Jan 30 (Reuters) - Wing On Company International Ltd :
* ‍EXPECTS TO RECORD AN INCREASE OF APPROXIMATELY 160 PCT IN AMOUNT OF PROFIT ATTRIBUTABLE TO SHAREHOLDERS FOR FY
* EXPECTED RESULT DUE TO INCREASE IN VALUATION GAINS ON GROUP‘S INVESTMENT PROPERTIES FOR YEAR ENDED 31 DECEMBER 2017
* ‍EXPECTS GROUP‘S FY UNDERLYING PROFIT ATTRIBUTABLE​ TO RISE 25 PERCENT Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
